name: sigil
description: Design physics framework for AI-generated UI components. Three-layer physics: Behavioral + Animation + Material = Feel.
longDescription: Sigil teaches Claude how to generate UI components with correct design physics. It detects effect from keywords and types, applies timing/sync/confirmation based on physics rules, and accumulates user taste preferences without configuration. Includes Web3 flow patterns, formal verification via Anchor/Lens CLIs, and diagnostic HUD integration.
